articles.author: John DeFeo
articles.title: Why I Write Letters to CEOs (and What I've Learned by Doing So)
articles.description: I write letters to CEOs and many of them write me back. Here are some of the responses that I’ve received and the lessons that I’ve learned.

articles.title: Intel Launches Optane DIMMs Up To 512GB: Apache Pass Is Here!
George Osborne’s London Evening Standard sells its editorial independence to Uber, Google and others – for £3 million
articles.description: Exclusive: Newspaper promised six commercial giants “money-can’t-buy” news coverage in a lucrative deal, leaving millions of Londoners unaware of who’s paying for their news.

articles.title: Actix web is a small, pragmatic, and extremely fast rust web framework

articles.author: Dustin Volz
articles.title: Judge Dismisses Kaspersky Suit Challenging Software Ban
articles.description: A U.S. judge dismissed Wednesday a pair of lawsuits filed by Russian cybersecurity firm Kaspersky Lab demanding the U.S. government rescind a ban on the use of its software in U.S. government computers, saying the action was justified to reduce cybersecurity risk.

articles.title: Predicting Stock Performance with Natural Language Deep Learning - Developer Blog
articles.description: We developed an NLP deep learning model using a one-dimensional convolutional neural network to predict future stock market performance of companies using Azure ML Workbench and Keras with open source for you to replicate.

articles.title: Ask HN: How to blog things I've learnt in graduate school?

articles.author: Tom Miles
articles.title: China overtakes U.S. for healthy lifespan: WHO data
articles.description: China has overtaken the United States in healthy life expectancy at birth for the first time, according to World Health Organization data.

articles.title: Reddit just passed Facebook as #3 most popular website in US
articles.description: What are the most popular sites in United States? We know! Learn which sites get the most traffic with a full suite of tools from Alexa.
